title: RITES Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Individual Consultant Posts
description: Rail India Technical and Economic Service (RITES) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Individual Consultant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the RITES Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online thr...
